item.title: How to install fonts in Linux
item.description: I have been using different distributions in my machines. A term which is called in our linux community distrohopping. On different distributions/machines, it’s pain to collect packages you can’t live without. For me and maybe for you too, the fonts are the part of OS which at least I care about the most. Fonts path Different linux distributions package fonts in with different names. So I decided to add the fonts to my dotfiles.
